means: 征服，降伏( subjugate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: After having been subjugated to ambition, your maternal instincts are at last starting to assert themselves.
sentence.Network_cn: 你那被雄心壮志压制已久的母性本能终于开始展现出来。

sentence.Network_en: The prince had appeared and subjugated the poor little handmaid.
sentence.Network_cn: 王子出现了,这使穷苦的小丫头不胜仰慕.

sentence.Network_en: As we know, rule over subjugated peoples is incompatible with the gentile constitution.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们知道, 对被征服者的统治,是和氏族制度不相容的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Under the industrial mode of life , humans subjugated in vast quarrelsome patriarchal nation - states ., 在工业模式的生活中 , 人类受制于大量好争吵的父权制民族国家中.
As we know , rule over subjugated peoples is incompatible with the gentile constitution ., 我们知道 , 对被征服者的统治 , 是和氏族制度不相容的.

list.abs: they were scared that their people would become mindless robots and accept complete cultural subjugation by the Americans .他们害怕法国人会变成毫无思想的机器人并完全接受美国人对他们的文化征服。
When the Empire subjugated the watery world , Ackbar was taken prisoner ., 帝国征服这个水世界后 , 阿克巴沦为俘虏.
the old Yankees stopped at nothing to subjugate the Irish immigrants .老杨基不顾一切地要制服爱尔兰移民。
什么意思... ... temporary subjugation 暂时征服 wifely subjugation 男尊女卑 Exercise subjugation 行使代位继承.

entry.tran: (尤指在战争中)征服，制服，使屈服
entry.def: If someone subjugates a group of people, they take complete control of them, especially by defeating them in a war.

example.ex: Their costly and futile attempt to subjugate the Afghans lasted just 10 years.
example.tran: 他们大动干戈想要控制阿富汗地区，但只持续了10年就无果而终了。

entry.tran: 使(愿望、渴望)退居其次;使让位于
entry.def: If your wishes or desires are subjugated to something, they are treated as less important than that thing.

example.ex: After having been subjugated to ambition, your maternal instincts are at last starting to assert themselves.
example.tran: 你那被雄心壮志压制已久的母性本能终于开始展现出来。

auth_sentence.content: Subjugated yearly under arches, Manumitted by parchments and degrees.
auth_sentence.res_content: Subjugated yearly under arches, Manumitted by parchments and degrees.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Subjugated yearly under arches, Manumitted by parchments and degrees.

auth_sentence.content: She said that mothers subjugated their own ambition into their children.
auth_sentence.res_content: She said that mothers subjugated their own ambition into their children.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She said that mothers subjugated their own ambition into their children.

auth_sentence.content: But for a numbed, subjugated nation, freedom was far from easy to grasp.
auth_sentence.res_content: But for a numbed, subjugated nation, freedom was far from easy to grasp.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But for a numbed, subjugated nation, freedom was far from easy to grasp.
